Text:
"Nice comment"

There, I left one and I mean it.  Thanks so much for making my life just that much more enjoyable.  Living in Asia and being from North America, I can't get a credit card, and couldn't pay for this stuff even if I wanted to.  If you're ever in Asia, I owe you, drop me a message.
-CB
This one is nasty. Don't miss it. Thank you!
